attributes.action: I want the government to suspend all 'net zero' policies immediately.
attributes.additional_details: The science behind 'net zero' is by no means settled (not that science ever can be, in any event). Renewable energy is costly, harmful to wildlife and itself has a huge negative environmental impact. Renewable energy is only economically viable with vast taxpayer subsidies which the country can ill afford. UK carbon emissions are trivial on a global scale. Germany has suffered massive economic damage in its own drive to pursue 'net zero' and if we do not act soon, the UK will follow suit.
attributes.background: I want the government to suspend all policies relating to 'net zero' with immediate effect.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Repeal the Climate Change Act 2008 and Net Zero targets
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701600
